everglades. unit states, largest tropic wilderness, largest wilder kind east mississippi river, visit averag one&#160;million peopl year.[3] third-largest nation park lower 48&#160;state death valley yellowstone. declar intern biospher reserve, world heritag site, wetland intern importance, one three locat world appear three lists.[4] although u.s. nation park preserv uniqu geograph features, everglad nation park first creat protect fragil ecosystem. everglad network wetland forest fed river flow .25 mile (0.40&#160;km) per day lake okeechobee, southwest florida bay.[5] park signific breed ground tropic wade bird north america, contain largest mangrov ecosystem western hemisphere,[6] home 36&#160;threaten protect speci includ florida panther, american crocodile, west indian manatee, support 350&#160;speci birds, 300&#160;speci fresh saltwat fish, 40&#160;speci mammals, 50&#160;speci reptiles.[7] major south florida' fresh water, store biscayn aquifer, recharg park.[8] human live thousand year around everglades, plan aros 1882 drain wetland develop recov land agricultur residenti use. 20th centuri progressed, water flow lake okeechobe increasingli control divert enabl explos bibliographi 10 extern link geography[edit] map everglad nation park everglad nation park cover 1,509,000 acr (6,110&#160;km2), throughout dade, monroe, collier counti florida.[9] elev typic rang 0 8 feet (2.4&#160;m) sea level, calusa-built shell mound gulf coast rise 20 feet (6.1&#160;m) sea level. geology[edit] terrain south florida rel consist flat. although rock format central draw everglad nation park, limeston underli everglad integr format divers ecosystem within park. florida part african portion supercontin gondwana. separated, condit allow shallow marin environ deposit calcium carbon sand, shells, coral convert limestone.[10] tini bit shell, sand, bryozoan compress multipl layer form uniqu structur limeston call ooids, creat porou permeabl condit hold water.[11] florida peninsula appear sea level 100,000 150,000&#160;year ago. sea level end wisconsin ice age rose, water tabl appear closer land. lake okeechobe began flood convect thunderstorm created.[12] vast peat deposit south lake okeechobe indic regular flood occur 5,000 year ago. plant began migrate, subtrop one northern part florida, tropic carri seed bird island caribbean.[13] although limeston shelf appear flat, slight rises—cal pinnacles—and depress caus eros limeston acid properti water. amount time throughout year water present locat everglad determin type soil, two everglades: peat, creat mani year decompos plant matter, marl, result dri periphyton, chunk alga microorgan creat grayish mud. portion everglad remain flood nine month year usual cover peat. area flood six month less cover marl. plant commun determin type soil amount water present.[14][15] climate[edit] common northern portion florida, underground spring feed water everglad system. underground reservoir call floridan aquif lie 1,000 feet (300&#160;m) surfac south florida.[16] however, everglad immens capac water storage, owe sponge-lik permeabl limeston beneath expos land. water arriv form rainfall, signific amount store limestone. water evapor everglad becom rain metropolitan areas, provid fresh water suppli region. water also flow park fall rain north onto watersh kissimme river sourc lake okeechobee, appear everglad day later. water overflow lake okeechobe river 40 70 mile (110&#160;km) wide, move almost imperceptibly.[17] everglad nation park tropic savanna climat (köppen climat classification: aw) tropic monsoon climat (köppen climat classification: am), depend location. central region savanna climat region closer shore, especi eastern quarter park monsoon climate. climat character two seasons: wet dry. park' dri season last decemb april, temperatur vari 53&#160;°f (12&#160;°c) 77&#160;°f (25&#160;°c) humid low. sinc water level low time, anim congreg central water locations, provid popular opportun view wildlife.[18] wet season, may november, temperatur consist 90&#160;°f (33&#160;°c) humid 90&#160;percent.[19] storm drop 10 12 inch (300&#160;mm) rain time, provid half year' averag 60&#160;inch (152&#160;cm) rainfal two months.[20] climat data flamingo ranger station, fl month jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec year averag high °f (°c) 76.6 (24.8) 78.1 (25.6) protect nation park invari includ formid geolog featur like mountains, geysers, canyons. florida' popul began grow significantli urban area near everglad developed, propon park' establish face difficulti persuad feder govern peopl florida subtl constantli shift ecosystem everglad worthi protection.[21] park establish 1947, becam first area within u.s. protect flora fauna nativ region oppos geolog scenery.[9] nation park servic recogn nine distinct interdepend ecosystem within park constantli shift size owe amount water present environment factors. freshwat slough marl prairies[edit] allig thrive freshwat slough marl prairies. freshwat slough perhap common ecosystem associ everglad nation park. drainag channel character low-li area cover fresh water, flow almost impercept 100 feet (30&#160;m) per day.[22] shark river slough taylor slough signific featur park. sawgrass grow length 6 feet (1.8&#160;m) more, broad-leaf marsh plants, promin region gave everglad nicknam "river grass", cement public imagin titl marjori stoneman douglas' book (1947), culmin year advocaci consid everglad ecosystem "swamp". excel feed locat birds, slough everglad attract great varieti wader herons, egrets, roseat spoonbil (platalea ajaja), ibis brown pelican (pelecanu occidentalis), well limpkin (aramu guarauna) snail kite eat appl snails, turn feed sawgrass. sloughs' avail fish, amphibians, young bird attract varieti freshwat turtles, allig (allig mississippiensis), water moccasin (agkistrodon piscivoru conanti), eastern diamondback rattlesnak (crotalu adamanteus).[23] great blue heron anhinga trail freshwat marl prairi similar sloughs, lack slow movement surfac water; instead, water seep calcit mud call marl. alga microscop organ form periphyton, attach limestone. dri turn gray mud.[24] sawgrass water plant grow shorter freshwat marl peat, type soil everglad found water remain present longer throughout year. marl prairi usual water three seven month year, wherea slough may remain submerg longer nine month sometim remain water one year next. sawgrass may domin sloughs, creat monoculture. grasses, muhli grass (muhlenbergia filipes) broad-leaf water plant found marl prairies.[25] anim live freshwat slough also inhabit marl prairies. marl prairi may go dri part year; allig play vital role maintain life remot part everglad burrow mud dri season, creat pool water fish amphibian surviv one year next. allig hole also attract anim congreg feed smaller prey. region flood wet season, fish amphibian sustain allig hole repopul freshwat marl prairies.[26] tropic hardwood hammocks[edit] main article: tropic hardwood hammock hammock often dri land within park. rise sever inch grass-cov river, domin divers plant life consist subtrop tropic trees, larg southern live oak (quercu virginiana). tree often form canopi anim thrive amongst scrub bush wild coffe (psychotria), white indigoberri (randia aculeata), poisonwood (metopium toxiferum) saw palmetto (serenoa repens). park featur thousand tree island amid sloughs—which often form shape teardrop seen (see park map) slowli move water around them—but also found pineland mangroves. tree everglades, includ wild tamarind (lysiloma latisiliquum) gumbo-limbo (bursera simaruba), rare grow higher 50 feet (15&#160;m) due wind, cold weather, lightn strikes.[27][28] approxim 160 florida panther still live wild, usual drier part everglades, hammock pinelands. plant growth around hammock base nearli impenetrable; however, beneath canopi hammock ideal habitat animals. reptil (such variou speci snake anole) amphibian (such american green tree frog, hyla cinerea), find home hardwood hammocks. bird bar owl (strix varia), woodpeckers, northern cardin (cardinali cardinalis), southern bald eagl (haliaeetu leucocephalus) nest hammock trees. mammal speci live hardwood hammock includ opossum (didelphi virginiana), raccoon (procyon lotor), bobcat (lynx rufus), everglad mink (neovison vison), marsh rabbit (sylvilagu palustris), white-tail deer (odocoileu virginianus), rare, critic endang florida panther (puma concolor coryi).[27] pineland[edit] sunris pine rockland long pine key natur trail. dade counti cover 186,000 acr (750&#160;km2) pine rockland forests, harvest lumber industry.[29] pineland ecosystem (or pine rocklands) character shallow, dri sandi loam limeston substrat cover almost exclus slash pine (pinu elliottii var. densa). tree ecosystem grow solut holes, soft limeston worn away fill soil, allow plant take hold.[30] pineland requir regular mainten fire ensur existence. south florida slash pine uniqu adapt promot fire drop larg amount dri pine needl shed dri bark. pine cone requir heat fire open, allow seed dispers take hold. trunk root slash pines, however, resist fire. prescrib burn area take place everi three seven years; without regular fires, hardwood tree begin grow region pineland becom recategor mix swamp forests.[31] plant area bloom 16 week fire.[32] nearli pineland understori palm shrubs, divers ground cover wild herbs.[31] pine rockland consid one threaten habitat florida; less 4,000 acr (16&#160;km2) pineland exist outsid park.[33] within park, 20,000 acr (81&#160;km2) pineland protected.[34] varieti anim speci meet need food, shelter, nesting, rook pine rocklands. woodpeckers, eastern meadowlark (sturnella magna), loggerhead shrike (laniu ludovicianus), grackles, northern mockingbird (mimu polyglottos) commonli found pinelands. black bear florida panther also live habitat.[31] cypress mangrove[edit] cypress tree conif adapt live stand fresh water. grow compact structur call cypress dome long strand limestone. water level may fluctuat dramat around cypress dome strands, cypress develop "knees" protrud water high level provid oxygen root systems. dwarf cypress tree grow drier area poorer soil. epiphytes, bromeliads, spanish moss (tillandsia usneoides), orchid fern grow branch trunk cypress trees. everglad nation park featur twenty-f speci orchids.[35] tall cypress tree provid excel nest area bird includ wild turkey (meleagri gallopavo), ibis, herons, egrets, anhinga (anhinga anhinga), belt kingfish (megaceryl alcyon). mammal cypress region includ white-tail deer, squirrels, raccoons, opossums, skunks, swamp rabbits, river otter (lontra canadensis), bobcats, well small rodents.[36][37] mangrov tree along coastlin protect shore erosion. mangrov tree cover coastlin south florida, sometim grow inland depend amount salt water present within everglad ecosystems. dryer year less fresh water flow coast, mangrov appear among fresh water plants. rain abundant, sawgrass fresh water plant may found closer coast. three speci mangrov trees—r (rhizophora mangle), black (avicennia germinans), white (laguncularia racemosa)—can found everglades. due high toler salt water, winds, extrem tides, high temperatures, muddi soils, mangrov tree uniqu adapt extrem conditions. act nurseri mani marin bird species. also florida' first defens destruct forc hurricanes, absorb flood water prevent coastal erosion.[38] mangrov system everglad nation park largest continu system mangrov world.[39] within florida mangrov system live 220&#160;speci fish, varieti crabs, crayfish, shrimp, mollusks, invertebrates, serv main sourc food mani birds.[40] dozen bird speci use mangrov nurseri food stores, includ pelicans, grebes, tricolor heron (egretta tricolor), gulls, terns, hawk kites, arbor bird like mangrov cuckoo (coccyzu minor), yellow warbler (dendroica petechia), white-crown pigeon (patagioena leucocephala).[41] mangrov also support 24&#160;speci amphibian reptiles, 18&#160;speci mammals, includ endang green turtl (chelonia mydas), hawksbil turtl (eretmoch imbricata), west indian manate (trichechu manatus).[42] coastal lowlands[edit] coastal lowlands, wet prairies, salt water marsh absorb marin water get high fresh water rain heavy. flood occur hurrican tropic storm surg ocean water rise sever feet land.[43] heavi wet season also caus flood rain north flow everglades. tree surviv condit region, plants—succul like saltwort glasswort—toler salt, brackish water, desert conditions. anim life zone depend upon amount water present, commonli found anim includ cape sabl seasid sparrow (ammodramu maritimu mirabilis), everglad snail kite (rostrhamu sociabilis), wood stork (mycteria americana), eastern indigo snake (drymarchon couperi), small mammal rats, mice, rabbits.[44] marin estuarine[edit] largest bodi water within park florida bay, extend mangrov swamp mainland' southern tip florida keys. 800 squar mile (2,100&#160;km2) marin ecosystem lie range. coral, sponges, seagrass serv shelter food crustacean mollusks, turn primari food sourc larger marin animals. sharks, stingrays, barracuda also live ecosystem, larger speci fish attract sport fishing. pelicans, shorebirds, terns, black skimmer (rynchop niger) among bird frequent park shorelines.[45] bay also resid popul bottlenos dolphin (tursiop truncatus).[46] human history[edit] nativ people[edit] sun set shark river slough. main article: indigen peopl everglad region human like first inhabit south florida region 10,000 20,000&#160;year ago.[47] two tribe nativ american develop peninsula' southern tip: tequesta live eastern side calusa, greater numbers, western side. everglad serv natur boundari them. tequesta live singl larg commun near mouth miami river, calusa live 30&#160;villages. group travel everglades, rare live within them, remain mostli along coast.[47] diet group consist mostli shellfish fish, small mammals, game, wild plants. access soft limestone, tool fashion nativ american region made shell, bone, wood, anim teeth; shark teeth use cut blades,[48] sharpen reed becam arrow spears.[49] shell mound still exist today within park, give archaeologist anthropologist evid raw materi avail indigen peopl tool construction. spanish explor estim number tequesta first contact around 800, calusa 2,000, although nation park servic report probabl 20,000 nativ live near everglad spanish establish contact late 16th century.[50] calusa societi advanced, live social strata, abl creat canals, earthworks, shellworks. calusa also abl resist spanish attempt conquest.[48] although spanish contact societies, establish mission north, near lake okeechobee. 18th century, invad creek incorpor dwindl number tequesta own. neither tequesta calusa tribe exist 1800.[51] disease, warfare, captur slaveri reason erad groups. evid exist within park boundari seri shell mound built calusa.[52] earli 19th century, creeks, escap african slaves, indian northern florida displac creek war form area' seminol nation. end seminol war 1842, seminol face reloc indian territori near oklahoma. hundr seminol hunter scout settl within today big cypress nation preserve, escap forc emigr west.[53] 1859 1930, seminol miccosukee, similar linguist uniqu tribe, live rel isolation, make live trading. 1928, survey construct began tamiami trail, along northern border everglad nation park. road bisect everglad also introduc steady, small, traffic white settler everglades.[54] member miccosuke seminol tribe continu live within park boundaries. manag park includ approv new polici procedur tribal repres "in manner conflict park purpose".[55] american settlements[edit] follow end seminol wars, american began settl isol point along coast park, ten thousand island cape sable. commun develop two largest piec dri ground area, chokoloske island flamingo cape sable, establish post offic earli 1890s.[56] chokoloske island shell mound, midden built roughli 20&#160;feet (6&#160;m) high thousand year occup calusa. settlement chokoloske flamingo serv trade center small popul farmers, fishermen charcoal burner settl ten thousand islands. settlement isol homestead could reach boat well 20th century. everglad city, mainland near chokoloskee, enjoy brief period prosper when, begin 1920, serv headquart construct tamiami trail. dirt road florida citi reach flamingo 1922, causeway final connect chokoloske mainland' everglad citi 1956.[57][58] park established, resid flamingo bought out, site incorpor park visitor center.[56] land develop conservation[edit] main article: drain develop everglad canal lock construct everglad 1906 sever attempt made drain develop everglad 1880s. first canal built everglad littl harm ecosystem, unabl drain much it.[59] however, napoleon bonapart broward base major 1904 campaign governor drainag would creat "the empir everglades".[60] broward order drainag took place 1905 1910, success enough land develop sold tract $30 acre, settl town davie, develop region lee dade counties. canal also clear water made way agricultur field grow sugarcane.[61][62] 1920 saw popul boom south florida creat florida land boom fuel demand land describ author michael grunwald "insanity".[63] land sold home structur built it, case plan construct place. new landowners, eager make good investments, hastili construct home small town recent drain land. mangrov tree coast taken better view replac shallow root palm trees. u.s. armi corp engin began construct larger canal control rise water everglades. nevertheless, lake okeechobe continu rise fall, region cover rain, citi planner continu battl water. 1926 miami hurrican caus lake okeechobe leve fail; hundr peopl move south lake drowned. two year later, 1928 okeechobe hurrican claim 2,500&#160;live lake okeechobe surg levees. politician declar everglad uninhabit silenc four-stori wall, name herbert hoover dike, built around lake okeechobee. wall effect cut water sourc everglades.[64] follow wall' construction, south florida endur drought sever enough caus massiv wildfir 1939. influx human detriment effect plant anim region melaleuca tree (melaleuca quinquenervia) introduc help drainage, along australian pine brought develop windbreaks. region' timber devast lumber supplies. alligators, birds, frogs, fish hunt massiv scale. entir rookeri wade bird shot collect plumes, use women' hat earli 20th century.[65] however, largest impact peopl region divers water away everglades. canal deepen widened, water level fell dramatically, caus chao food webs.[66] salt water replac fresh water canals, 1997 scientist notic salt water seep biscayn aquifer, south florida' water source.[67] 1940s, freelanc writer former report miami herald name marjori stoneman dougla began research everglad assign miami river. studi land water five years, publish everglades: river grass 1947, describ area great detail, includ chapter disappearance. wrote: "what river grass sweet water given mean life uniqu enorm geographi centuri man place made, one chaotic gestur greed ignor folly, river fire."[68] book sold 500,000 copi sinc publication, douglas' continu dedic ecolog conserv earn nicknam "grand dame everglades", "grandmoth everglades" "the anti-christ" singular focu expens polit interests.[69] found serv presid organ call friend everglades, initi intend protest construct propos big cypress jetport 1968. success confrontation, organ grown 4,000 members, commit preserv everglades.[70] wrote spoke import everglad death age 108 1998. park history[edit] information: ernest f. coe cape sabl seen spot satellit floridian hope preserv least part everglad began express concern diminish resourc earli 20th century. royal palm state park creat 1916; includ sever trail visitor' center sever mile homestead. miami-bas naturalist first propos area becom nation park 1923. five year later, florida state legislatur establish tropic everglad nation park commiss studi format protect area.[71] commiss led land develop turn conservationist name ernest f. coe, eventu nicknam father everglad nation park.[72] coe' origin plan park includ 2,000,000 acr (8,100&#160;km2) includ key largo big cypress, unwilling compromis almost prevent park' creation. variou interests, includ land develop sport hunters, demand land trimmed.[71] commiss also task propos method rais money purchas land.[73] search coincid arriv great depress unit states, money land purchas scarce.[74] u.s. hous repres author creation new nation park may 30, 1934, pass rider ensur money would allot project least five years.[73] coe' passion u.s. senat spessard holland' politick help fulli establish park, holland abl negoti 1,300,000 acr (5,300&#160;km2) park, leav big cypress, key largo, turner river area, 22,000-acr (89&#160;km2) tract land call "the hole donut" highli valu agriculture. miami herald editor john pennekamp instrument push florida legislatur rais $2&#160;million purchas privat land insid park boundaries.[75] dedic presid harri truman decemb 6, 1947, one month douglas' book released.[76] year, sever tropic storm struck south florida, prompt construct 1,400 mile (2,300&#160;km) canals, send water unwant farmer resid ocean.[74] park protect last stand pine rockland florida. central southern florida flood control project (c&amp;sf) author congress construct thousand mile canal flood control structur across south florida. c&amp;sf, run u.s. armi corp engineers, establish agricultur area directli south lake okeechobee, three water conserv areas, border canal divert excess water either urban area atlant ocean, gulf mexico florida bay. south manmad region everglad nation park, effect cut water supply. 1960s, park visibl suffering. although c&amp;sf direct provid enough water sustain park, follow through.[77] propos airport would dire environ effect everglad nation park becam center battl help initi environment movement local nation politics. airport propos eventu abandon 1972 bill introduc curb develop south florida ensur nation park would receiv amount water needed. effort turn repair damag wrought decad mismanagement: armi corp engin chang focu 1990 construct dam canal construct "pure environment projects".[78] region origin includ ernest coe' vision nation park slowli ad year park incorpor protect areas: biscayn nation park, big cypress nation preserve, john pennekamp coral reef state park key largo, ten thousand island nation wildlif refuge, florida key nation marin sanctuari protect park' open 1947. everglad nation park design intern biospher reserv octob 26, 1976. novemb 10, 1978, park declar wilder area. wilder design cover 1,296,505 acr (5,246.77&#160;km2) 2003—about 86&#160;percent park. list unesco world heritag site octob 24, 1979 wetland intern import june 4, 1987.[3] place list world heritag danger 1993 2007 2010.[79] restor efforts[edit] information: restor everglad littl blue heron hunt near water anhinga trail presid georg h. w. bush sign everglad nation park protect expans act decemb 13, 1989 ad 109,506 acr (443.16&#160;km2) eastern side park, close park airboats, direct depart armi restor water improv ecosystem within everglad nation park, "direct(ed) secretari interior manag park order maintain natur abundance, diversity, ecolog integr nativ plant animals, well behavior nativ animals, part ecosystem."[80] bush remark statement sign act, "through legisl river grass may restor natur flow water".[81] 1993, however, park place list world heritag danger. 2000, congress approv feder effort restor everglades, name comprehens everglad restor plan (cerp), object "restoration, preserv protect south florida ecosystem provid water-rel need region",[82] claim largest environment restor history. controversi plan; detractor worri "reli uncertain technologies, overlook water quality, subsid damag growth delay environment benefits".[83] support plan includ nation audubon society, accus friend everglad biodivers legal foundat priorit agricultur busi interests.[83] namesak anhinga trail dri feather cerp project design captur 1.7&#160;billion us gallon (6,400,000&#160;m3) fresh water everi day, store underground reservoir releas water area within 16&#160;counti south florida. approxim 35,600 acr (144&#160;km2) man-mad wetland construct confin contamin water releas everglades, 240 mile (390&#160;km) canal divert water away everglad destroyed.[84] first five year implementation, cerp respons purchas 207,000 acr (840&#160;km2) land cost $1&#160;billion. plan aim spend $10.5&#160;billion 30&#160;years, combin 50 differ project give 5-year timelines.[85] state florida invest $2 billion restor everglades, fund match u.s. government.[86] june 2008, u.s. govern spent $400 million $7.8 billion legislated.[87] initi could aid everglad restor includ u.s. sugar land corp transaction, c-111 spreader canal tamiami trail bridging. project support group everglad foundation, whose mission aid effort save america' everglad futur generations.[88] spite this, everglad nation park remov 2007 list world heritag danger.[89] however, list list world heritag danger 2010.[90] nation research council report septemb 2008 cerp project completed, lack progress water deliveri everglad nation park "i one discourag stori everglad restoration".[91] everglad nation park directli hit hurrican katrina, wilma, rita 2005. storm natur part park' ecosystem; 1960' hurrican donna left noth mangrov "stand dead snags" sever mile wide, 30&#160;year later area complet recovered.[22] predictably, suffer park 2005 hurrican manmad structures. 2009 visitors' center lodg flamingo irrepar damag 125&#160;mph (201&#160;km/h) wind 8&#160;ft (2.4&#160;m) storm surge; lodg function 50 year torn down: noth slate replac it.[92] park economics[edit] everglad nation park report 2005 budget $28&#160;million. that, $14.8&#160;million grant nation park service, $13.5&#160;million variou sourc includ cerp, donations, grants.[93] entri fee vehicl 2006 rang $10 $200 bu tours. nearli one million visitor everglad nation park 2006, 38,000 overnight campers, pay $16 night $10 night backcountri permits.[94] visitor spent $2.6 million[93] within park $48&#160;million local economies.[95] 900&#160;job sustain creat within park, park ad valu $35&#160;million local economies.[95] activities[edit] busiest season visitor decemb march, temperatur lowest mosquito least active. park featur four visitor centers: tamiami trail (part u.s. rout 41) directli west miami shark valley visitor center. fifteen-mil (24&#160;km) round trip path lead center two-stori observ tower. tram tour avail busi season. closest homestead state road 9336 ernest f. coe visitor center, 38-mile (61&#160;km) road begins, wind pine rockland, cypress, freshwat marl prairie, coastal prairie, mangrov ecosystems. variou hike trail access road, run flamingo visitor center marina, open staf busier time year. gulf coast visitor center closest everglad citi state road 29 along west coast. gulf coast visitor center give canoer access wilder waterway, 99-mile (160&#160;km) cano trail extend flamingo visitor center.[96] western coast park ten thousand island variou key island florida bay access boat. trails[edit] view vast sawgrass expans north anhinga trail give visitor opportun see freshwat slough close. sever walk trail park vari hike difficulti pine island, visitor cross hardwood hammocks, pinelands, freshwat sloughs. start royal palm visitor center, anhinga trail half-mil self-guid tour sawgrass marsh visitor see alligators, marsh wade birds, turtles, bromeliads. proxim homestead access make one visit site park. nearbi gumbo limbo trail also self-guided, half mile long. loop canopi hardwood hammock includ gumbo limbo, royal palm (roystonea), strangler fig (ficu aurea), varieti epiphytes.[97] twenti eight mile (45&#160;km) trail start near long pine key campground wind long pine key, well-suit offroad cycl pine rockland marjori stoneman dougla wilder area. two boardwalk allow visitor walk cypress forest pa-hay-o-kee, also featur two-stori overlook, anoth mahogani hammock (refer swietenia mahagoni) take hiker dens forest middl freshwat marl prairie.[98] closer flamingo, rug trail take visitor mangrov swamps, along florida bay. christian point trail, snake bight trail, rowdi bend trail coastal prairi trail allow view shorebird wade bird among mangroves. portion trail may impass depend time year, mosquito water levels. ranger-l tour take place busier season only.[99] camp recreation[edit] campground flamingo camp avail year-round everglad nation park. frontcountri camping, services, avail long pine key, close ernest f. coe visitor center, 108&#160;site access car. near flamingo, 234&#160;campsit servic also available. recreat vehicl camp avail sites, although necessari services. backcountri permit requir campsit along wilder waterway, gulf coast sites, site variou keys. sever backcountri site chickees; other beach ground sites.[100] low-pow motorboat allow park, although major salt water area no-wak zone protect manate marin anim harm. jet skis, airboats, motor person watercraft prohibited. however, mani trail allow kayak canoes. state licens requir fishing, although fresh water licens sold park, salt water licens may available. swim recommend within park boundaries; water moccasins, snap turtl (chelydra serpentina), allig crocodil thrive fresh water. sharks, barracuda, sharp danger coral plenti salt water. visibl low kinds.[101] everglad nation park import part great florida bird trail. [102] great biodivers mani speci bird bird watch bird photographi also. threat park ecology[edit] divers qualiti water[edit] bromeliad flourish bald cypress tree great egret pass less 50&#160;percent everglad exist prior drainag attempt remain intact today. popul wade bird dwindl 90&#160;percent origin number 1940 2000s.[103] divers water south florida' still-grow metropolitan area everglad nation park' number one threat. 1950 1960s, 1,400 mile (2,300&#160;km) canal levees, 150&#160;gate spillways, 16&#160;pump station construct direct water toward citi away everglades. low level water leav fish vulner reptil birds, sawgrass dri burn die off, turn kill appl snail anim wade bird feed upon.[96] popul bird fluctuate; 2009, south florida water manag district claim wade bird across south florida increas 335&#160;percent.[104] however, follow three year higher numbers, miami herald report year popul wade bird within park decreas 29&#160;percent.[105] west coast florida reli desalin fresh water; quantiti demand great land provide. nitrat underground water system high level mercuri also impact qualiti fresh water park receives.[96] 1998 florida panther found dead shark water slough, level mercuri high enough kill human.[106] increas occurr algal bloom red tide biscayn bay florida bay trace amount control water releas lake okeechobee.[107] brochur given visitor everglad nation park includ statement reads, "freshwat flow park engineered. help pumps, floodgates, retent pond along park' boundary, everglad present life support, aliv diminished."[96] urban encroachment[edit] seri leve park' eastern border mark line urban protect areas, develop area threaten park system. florida still attract nearli thousand new resid everi day, build residential, commerci industri zone near everglad nation park stress water balanc ecosystem within park. park' western border, fort myers, napl cape coral expanding, system leve exist mark border.[108] nation geograph rate everglad nation park big cypress nation preserv lowest-scor park north america, 32 100. score system rate 55&#160;park term sustain tourism, destin quality, park management. expert compil result justifi score stating: "encroach hous retail develop thrown preciou ecosystem tailspin, humankind back off, noth left one country' amaz treasures".[109] endang threaten animals[edit] american crocodil notabl differ alligator. habitat destruct vehicl collis largest threat experiences. thirty-six feder protect anim live park, face grave threat survival. unit states, american crocodile' habitat within south florida. overhunt hides. protect today hunting, still threaten due habitat destruct injuri vehicl collis cross road reach waterways. 1,000 crocodil live florida roughli 50 nest everglad biscayn nation parks.[110] crocodil popul south florida increas number alligators. crocodil reclassifi "endangered" "threatened" unit state 2007.[111] florida panther one endang mammal earth. 50 live wild, primarili everglad big cypress swamp. biggest threat panther includ habitat destruct human development, vehicl collisions, inbreed due limit gene pool, parasites, diseases, mercuri poisoning.[112] four everglad speci sea turtl includ atlant green sea turtle, atlant hawksbill, atlant loggerhead (caretta caretta), atlant ridley (lepidoch kempii) endangered. also, leatherback sea turtl (dermoch coriacea) threatened. number difficult determine, sinc male juvenil return birthplace, although femal lay egg locat everi year. habitat loss illeg poach destruct fish practic biggest threat animals.[113] two speci bird park danger disappearing. rang cape sabl seasid sparrow restrict everglad nation park big cypress swamp.[114] 1981 6,656 cape sabl seasid sparrow report park boundaries, survey 10 year document declin estim 2,624 bird 2002.[115] attempt return natur level water park controversial; cape sabl seasid sparrow nest foot ground, rise water level may harm futur populations, well threaten endang snail kite.[116] everglad snail kite eat appl snail almost exclusively, everglad locat unit state bird prey exists. evid popul may increasing, loss habitat food sourc keep estim number bird sever hundred.[117] west indian manate upgrad endang threatened. collis boat habitat loss still biggest threats.[118] drought, fire, rise sea levels[edit] fire natur occur lightn storms, take heaviest toll water level low. hardwood hammock cypress tree suscept heavi damag fire, may take decad grow back.[96] peat built centuri marsh caus fire burn deep scar soil. 2007, fred sklar south florida water manag district said: "an extrem drought view (as) almost catastroph volcano. reshap entir landscape. take 1,000 year produc two inch peat, lose coupl inch week."[119] rise sea level caus global warm anoth threat futur park. sinc 1932, ocean level key west steadili risen 0.7 feet (0.2&#160;m), could disastr consequ land close ocean.[120] estim within 500 year freshwat habitat everglad nation park obliter salt water, leav northernmost portion everglades. cost estim rais replac tamiami trail allig alley bridg hundr million dollars.[121] non-n species[edit] information: list invas speci everglad burmes python florida aerial view southwestern tip everglad nation park introduct non-n speci south florida consider problem park. mani biolog control like weather, disease, consum natur limit plant nativ environ exist everglades, caus mani grow larger multipli far beyond averag number nativ habitats. approxim 26&#160;percent fish, reptiles, birds, mammal speci south florida exotic—mor part u.s.—and region host one highest number exot plant speci world.[122] speci adapt aggress condit everglades, spread quickli compet nativ speci sometim threaten endangered, call "invasive". thousand exot plant speci observ south florida, usual introduc ornament landscaping, park staff must erad invas plant melaleuca tree (melaleuca quinquenervia), brazilian pepper (schinu terebinthifolius), old world climb fern (lygodium microphyllum).[123] similarly, anim often find predat natur barrier reproduct everglad originate, thu often reproduc quickli efficiently. lobat lac scale insect (paratachardina pseudolobata) kill shrub plant hardwood hammocks. bromeliad beetl (metamasiu callizona) destroy bromeliad ecosystem host.[124] walk catfish (claria batrachus) deplet aquacultur stock carri enter septicemia.[125] florida fish wildlif conserv commiss (fwc) list eight "reptil concern", includ burmes python (python moluru bivittatus), focus larg size aggress natures, allow licens hunter kill list anim protect area sell meat hides.[126][127] burmes pythons, two subspeci african rock python (python sebae; northern southern), yellow anaconda (eunect notaeus) ban import u.s. 2012. u.s. secretari interior ken salazar announc inclus reptil everglad nation park.[128] exot speci control fall manag u.s. fish wildlif service, compil dissemin inform invas speci sinc 1994. control invas speci cost $500&#160;million year, 1,700,000 acr (6,900&#160;km2) land south florida remain infested.[129] see also[edit] big cypress nation preserv biscayn nation
